alert.note: Alert for Clare; Isabella (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 3:07PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Michigan, including the following, southern Clare County and northern Isabella County. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. Some roads may be closed or washed out due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 303 PM EDT, Radar and automated rain gauges indicated 2 to 4 inches of rain has fallen in the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Clare, Farwell, Rosebush, Loomis, Delwin, Bailey Lake, Weidman and Brinton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
